feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.42.2: Localhost Email Fix
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Email: Authentication nil by default (#2361) @pglombardo
  • Update Robots.txt generator (#2356) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump turbo-rails from 2.0.5 to 2.0.6 (#2359) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump apipie-rails from 1.4.0 to 1.4.2 (#2358) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump ruby-statistics from 3.0.2 to 4.0.0 (#2321) @dependabot
  • Remove Flag Icons Set (#2357) @pglombardo

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.42.2

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website
  • Twitter
  • Newsletter

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.43.0: Bring Back the Language Dropdown
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:rocket: Features

  • Bring back language dropdown menu (#2363) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.957.0 to 1.958.0 (#2372) @dependabot

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sigv4 from 1.8.0 to 1.9.0 (#2367) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.43.1: Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • fixed link to 3rd party tools in README.md (#2384) @ochristi

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Language Strings (#2374) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.156.0 to 1.157.0 (#2392) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump bootsnap from 1.18.3 to 1.18.4 (#2397) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-cloud-core from 1.7.0 to 1.7.1 (#2395) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.961.0 to 1.962.0 (#2396) @dependabot

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.960.0 to 1.961.0 (#2391) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump erb_lint from 0.5.0 to 0.6.0 (#2389) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump autoprefixer-rails from 10.4.16.0 to 10.4.19.0 (#2388) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rexml from 3.3.2 to 3.3.3 (#2387) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump sprockets-rails from 3.5.1 to 3.5.2 (#2386) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.959.0 to 1.960.0 (#2381) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-core from 0.15.0 to 0.15.1 (#2380) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump zeitwerk from 2.6.16 to 2.6.17 (#2379) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sigv4 from 1.9.0 to 1.9.1 (#2378) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.958.0 to 1.959.0 (#2377) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump nokogiri from 1.16.6 to 1.16.7 (#2375) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump pg from 1.5.6 to 1.5.7 (#2376) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.40.0 to 0.41.0 (#2373) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.44.0: New Public Gateway Container
entry.content:
This release introduces a new BETA public gateway container.

Read the announcement on X https://x.com/pwpush/status/1822653929987223712

Read the documentation: https://docs.pwpush.com/docs/public-gateway/

:memo: What’s Changed

  • New Public Gateway Container (#2407) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump parallel from 1.25.1 to 1.26.1 (#2402) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.201.3 to 3.201.4 (#2400) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump oj from 3.16.4 to 3.16.5 (#2398) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.0: Framework Upgrade & New British English Support
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Add new British English Language Support (#2420) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • Application Framework Updates (#2419) @pglombardo
  • :arrow_up: Bump ruby-statistics from 4.0.0 to 4.0.1 (#2418) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.39.2 to 1.40.0 (#2416) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rails from 7.1.3.4 to 7.2.0 (#2409) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rexml from 3.3.4 to 3.3.5 (#2414) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump lockbox from 1.3.3 to 1.4.0 (#2413) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.41.0 to 0.42.0 (#2412) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump parallel from 1.26.1 to 1.26.2 (#2411) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump concurrent-ruby from 1.3.3 to 1.3.4 (#2410) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.962.0 to 1.963.0 (#2408) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo
